Package it.areson.interdimension.runnables

Class PortalCountdown

java.lang.Object
it.areson.interdimension.runnables.PortalCountdown
public class PortalCountdown
extends java.lang.Object
Wrapper of BukkitRunnable to start a simple delayed task.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.List<PortalCountdownEndListener> listeners
    Static list of PortalCountdownEndListener to notify the end to.
    private org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin
    Instance of the plugin.
    private Portal portal
    This countdown's connected portal.
    private org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable runnable
    Runnable that will be delayed.
    private int seconds
    Seconds of the countdown.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PortalCountdown​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, int seconds, Portal portal)
    Create a new countdown, not started by default.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void interruptCountdown()
    Interrupts the countdown (and notifies the listeners).
    private void notifyAllListeners()
    Notify all registered listeners that the countdown has finished.
    static void registerListener​(PortalCountdownEndListener portalCountdownEndListener)
    Register a new listener to notify countdown finishes.

    Starts the countdown.

  • Constructor Details

    • PortalCountdown

      public PortalCountdown​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, int seconds, Portal portal)
      Create a new countdown, not started by default.
      Parameters:
      plugin - Plugin instance.
      seconds - Seconds of the countdown.
      portal - Portal connected to this countdown.

  • Method Details
